form.h3: بچّوں کا انرولمنٹ رجسٹر برائے ٹیکاجات - Child Enrollment Vaccination Register

label.span: Shehr: ; Town: ; UC: ; Center ka naam:
Number 8 hindason par mushtamil hona chahiye
Andraaj ke liye bachay ki umar paanch saal se kam honi chahiye.
Child's age must be less than five years for enrollment.
Andraaj ke liye bachay ki umar paanch saal se kam honi chahiye
Child's age must be less than five years for enrollment

option.data-items-path: instance('ucs')/root/item[(province= /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/province and city= /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/city_village and town= /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/town ) or town='na']

label.span: Hasil karda malomaat ki jaga ke GPS coordinates darj karain
Collect GPS coordinates of data entry location
GPS coordinates can only be collected when outside.

legend.span: Kya bacha pedaaish ke waqt kissi marz mai mubtila tha?
Was the child suffering from a disease at birth?
Kya aap apnay bachay ki agli vaccine ki tareekh ke liye SMS mausool karna chahtay hain?
Are you willing to receive SMS reminders for your next visit?

label.span: Phone number 11 hindason par mushtamil aur mundarja zail shakal main hona chahiey: 03*********
Phone number should be 11 digits in the following format: 03*********

option.data-items-path: instance('vaccines')/root/item[(name = 'bcg' ) or (name = 'opv0' ) or (name = 'penta1' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 35 ) or (name = 'pcv1' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 35 ) or (name = 'opv1' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 35 ) or (name = 'penta2' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 63 ) or (name = 'pcv2' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 63 ) or (name = 'opv2' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 63 ) or (name = 'penta3' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 91 ) or (name = 'pcv3' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 91 ) or (name = 'opv3' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 91 ) or (name = 'ipv' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 91 ) or (name = 'measles1' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 250 ) or (name = 'measles2' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 340 )]

label.span: Teeka lagnay ki tareekh, bachay ki tareekh-e-pedaaish ke baad aur indraaj ki tareekh se pehlay honi chahiye.
The date of vaccination must be after child's birthdate and before registration date
Teeka lagnay ki tareekh, bachay ki tareekh-e-pedaaish ke baad aur aaj ki tareekh se pehlay honi chahiye.

option.data-items-path: instance('vaccines')/root/item[(name = 'bcg' and not(contains( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/vaccines , 'bcg'))) or (name = 'opv0' and not(contains( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/vaccines , 'opv0'))) or (name = 'penta1' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 35 and not(contains( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/vaccines , 'penta1'))) or (name = 'pcv1' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 35 and not(contains( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/vaccines , 'pcv1'))) or (name = 'opv1' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 35 and not(contains( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/vaccines , 'opv1'))) or (name = 'penta2' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 63 and not(contains( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/vaccines , 'penta2'))) or (name = 'pcv2' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 63 and not(contains( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/vaccines , 'pcv2'))) or (name = 'opv2' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 63 and not(contains( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/vaccines , 'opv2'))) or (name = 'penta3' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 91 and not(contains( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/vaccines , 'penta3'))) or (name = 'pcv3' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 91 and not(contains( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/vaccines , 'pcv3'))) or (name = 'opv3' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 91 and not(contains( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/vaccines , 'opv3'))) or (name = 'ipv' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 91 and not(contains( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/vaccines , 'ipv'))) or (name = 'measles1' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 250 and not(contains( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/vaccines , 'measles1'))) or (name = 'measles2' and number( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/age_days ) > 340 and not(contains( /Child_Vaccination_Enrollment/vaccines , 'measles2')))]
